lead_paragraph: A memorandum, written in 1991 by a member of the Egyptian Muslim Brotherhood, outlined a strategic plan in the United States that involved “eliminating and destroying the Western civilization from within.” Critics emphasize a page in the document where more than two dozen Muslim-American groups are listed under the heading “our organizations and the organizations of our friends.” But skeptics point out that, on the same page, the author wrote “imagine if they all march according to one plan,” which suggests that they were not.

headline.main: Explanatory Memorandum by Muslim Brotherhood From 1991
